ygData.subject: Re: Re:Hill Giants
ygData.msgSnippet: At what level can a wizard begin affecting a Hill Giant, and what level affect it decently? Also Sand Giants, if there is a difference. Shannyn ... From: Bob
ygData.messageBody:
At what level can a wizard begin affecting a Hill Giant, and what level affect it decently? Also Sand Giants, if there is a difference.

Shannyn



>>> Bob <vampyre@...> 01/20/00 05:13AM >>>
From: Bob <vampyre@...>

The lighting line is supposed to be one of these spells obviously. I've
never bothered though :)


I just use what ever works. I do prefer outside much more than inside.
It's too hard to run away inside and Jboots only work outside.
